extensionDescription.message: Neural Machine Translation for the browser.

translationStatus_UNAVAILABLE_mainInterf.description: Main interface dropdown message for: When no translation is relevant (about-pages and the like)

translationStatus_DETECTING_LANGUAGE_mai.description: Main interface dropdown message for: While language detection is being performed

translationStatus_LANGUAGE_NOT_DETECTED_.message: Please select which language this web page is in.
translationStatus_LANGUAGE_NOT_DETECTED_.description: Main interface dropdown message for: When web page language detection does not succeed

translationStatus_SOURCE_LANGUAGE_UNDERS.message: This page is in a language you understand ([SOURCE_LANG]).
translationStatus_SOURCE_LANGUAGE_UNDERS.description: Main interface dropdown message for: When web page is in the user's language(s)

translationStatus_DETECTED_LANGUAGE_UNSU.description: Main interface dropdown message for: When web page is in an unsupported language

translationStatus_OFFER_mainInterfaceMes.message: This page is in [SOURCE_LANG]. Translate this page?
translationStatus_OFFER_mainInterfaceMes.description: Main interface dropdown message for: When language detection is ready and web page is in a language different than the user language(s)

translationStatus_DOWNLOADING_TRANSLATIO.description: Main interface dropdown message for: Translation in Progress

translationStatus_TRANSLATING_mainInterf.description: Main interface dropdown message for: Translation in Progress

translationStatus_TRANSLATED_mainInterfa.message: This page has been translated from [SOURCE_LANG] to [TARGET_LANG].
translationStatus_TRANSLATED_mainInterfa.description: Main interface dropdown message for: Page Successfully Translated

translationStatus_ERROR_mainInterfaceMes.message: There has been an error while preparing translation or translating this page.
translationStatus_ERROR_mainInterfaceMes.description: Main interface dropdown message for: Page Translation Error
